entities.name: wizards
entities.description: Wizards are mentioned as risking their own safety to protect Muggle friends and neighbors.

entities.name: witches
entities.description: Witches are also mentioned as risking their own safety to protect Muggle friends and neighbors.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as being protected by wizards and witches without their knowledge.

entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is a person who asks a question to Kingsley.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is a person who replies to Lee's question.

relationships.description: Wizards protect Muggle friends and neighbors without their knowledge.
Witches also protect Muggle friends and neighbors without their knowledge.
Lee asks a question to Kingsley.
Kingsley says that 'Wizards first' can lead to 'Pure-bloods first' and then to 'Death Eaters'.
